content:
You need to install the `requests` library, which is required for making HTTP requests in the test script. You can install it using pip:

```bash
pip install requests
```

After running this command, try running the test script again. If you encounter any other missing modules, you'll need to install those as well. If you prefer, you can install all the required dependencies at once using the requirements.txt file:

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

This will install all the necessary libraries including Flask, requests, and other dependencies needed for the system to run properly.

Let me know if you encounter any other issues!
